item.title: Master Presenter (Level 7)
item.description: Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits) with git show

item.title: Apprentice Chimney Sweeper (Level 3)
item.description: Used git gc to run a number of housekeeping tasks on the current repository.

item.title: Merchant (Level 5)
item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.

item.title: Master Carpenter (Level 9)
item.description: Custom git hooks are installed which help catch issues before they are shared.

item.title: Apprentice Gardner (Level 1)
item.description: Shows the commit ancestry graph with git show-branch

item.title: Master Product Manager (Level 7)
item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.title: Master Socialite (Level 7)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Butcher (Level 5)
item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.

item.title: Apprentice Chimney Sweeper (Level 2)
item.description: Used git gc to run a number of housekeeping tasks on the current repository.

item.title: Merchant (Level 4)
item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.

item.title: Presenter (Level 6)
item.description: Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits) with git show

item.title: Inventor (count)
item.description: Used a command that isn't part of the built in Git command

item.title: Cleaning lady (Level 5)
item.description: Remove untracked files from the working tree with git clean

item.title: Master Historian (Level 7)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Traveler (Level 5)
item.description: Streamed changes between another rcs with git svn or git p4.

item.title: Socialite (Level 6)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Author (Level 4)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Product Manager (Level 6)
item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.title: Apprentice Archivist (Level 3)
item.description: Prepare each commit with its patch in one file per commit with git format-patch

item.title: Butcher (Level 4)
item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.
